content: description dive into the world of crochet with this beginner-friendly dishcloth project perfect for those looking to master the fundamental single_crochet stitch this simple yet practical creation is designed to build confidence in new crocheters offering a straightforward path to completing a project that s both useful and gratifying yarn yarn 1 x ricorumi spin spin dk cotton 50g/115m this yarn is dk yarn/light worsted/8-ply hook 4 mm us g hook skills level - beginner sizing length = 9 5 inches/25 cm width = 9 5 inches /25 cm don t forget to follow handy little me on social media for more updates and to share your finished projects instagram @handylittleme facebook facebook com/handylittleme ravelry ravelry com/people/handylittleme pinterest pinterest co uk/handylittleme copyright the patterns and photographs of this design are the property of handy little me this pattern and design are subject to copyright and are for personal non-commercial use only you may not distribute or sell this pattern collection or any items created using the directions in this pattern collection without consent please visit my terms of use page for additional information
